name: Na-Kel Smith
description: '''Na-Kel Allah Smith'''  (born July 22, 1994) is an American skateboarder, rapper, songwriter and actor. Originally a skateboarder from the [[Los Angeles]] area, he was known for his association with the [[hip hop collective]] [[Odd Future]], appearing in music videos, vlogs and their [[Adult Swim]] TV show ''[[Loiter Squad]]'', and performing live with the collective and its members.
